modName: Ebony Mail to Daedric Armor Retex
summary: This mod turns an Ebony Mail into Daedric armor for those who hate carrying around both pieces of equipment.
descriptionHtml:
[b]About:[/b]
I always loved sneaking, and when I got the Ebony Mail I was pretty excited. However, I also really loved wearing full Daedric armor. So I ended up carrying both. 

Whenever I wanted to sneak I would put on the Ebony mail but it was always a complete buzz kill. As we all know, Daedric equipment with an Ebony mail isn\'t all that visually pleasing. This mod aims to fix that. You\'ll no longer have to carry around both pieces of equipment and can store your Daedric armor at home. 

[b]Remember to endorse if you enjoy this mod![/b]

[b]What this mod does: [/b]
This mod makes the Ebony mail look exactly like Daedric armor. Should work for both males and females. 

[b]Note:[/b]
This is my first mod. I am sure I included unnecessary files, so please point out anything done wrong as all I did was some renaming and replacing.  

[b]Installation:[/b]
1. Extract the rar contents.
2. Drag and drop both folders into your Skyrim Data folder.
3. Play

[youtube]qWY-gzGY7_E[/youtube]
author: Spyro
